books.title: Becoming a better you
books.author: Bishop Ayo Odunayo
books.description: The Shiba Inu is the smallest of the six original and distinct spitz breeds of dog from Japan. A small, agile dog that copes very well with mountainous terrain, the Shiba Inu was originally bred for hunting.
